page.title: 19POLICE
page.content: The distrct is policed by 'panda' patrol vehicles which travel out from the main centres. There is no longer a local, village 'Bobby' but special constables are appointed who are people with a local knowledge of the area and who generally have other jobs during the normal working day. Since the area is not heavily populated and there are only a few small, often isolated communities, the incidence of major crime is not all that great. As is the case with other areas of the country, there is a police officer who has the special task of liaising with the school.
